text:
is an endemic of South Africa known as Sutherlandia frutescens (balloon pea).
It is a Fabaceous bush with bright red flowers and globose legumes.
As an herbal plant is a panacea, especially among Nam, Khoi and San Peoples in stomach problems, diabetes and so on (adaptogen)
As an array of biodynamic molecules represent a challenge for quality control; whereas flavonoids appear most replicable contents
